coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: A strong and rich coffee, typically served in a small cup. It forms the base for many other coffee drinks.
coffees.flavorProfile: Bold, concentrated, with a thick crema on top.

coffees.name: Latte
coffees.description: A smooth, milky coffee made with one part espresso and three parts steamed milk, often topped with a small amount of foam.
coffees.flavorProfile: Creamy, mild, with a subtle coffee flavor.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: A balanced coffee drink consisting of equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam, often topped with cocoa powder or cinnamon.
coffees.flavorProfile: Rich, creamy, with a strong coffee flavor and a velvety texture.

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: A coffee drink made by diluting an espresso with hot water, resulting in a similar strength to drip coffee but with a different flavor profile.
coffees.flavorProfile: Smooth, mild, with a slightly bitter taste.

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a caffe latte, combining espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup or cocoa powder, often topped with whipped cream.
coffees.flavorProfile: Sweet, chocolatey, with a rich coffee undertone.

coffees.name: Macchiato
coffees.description: A coffee drink made with espresso 'stained' with a small amount of milk or milk foam. The name 'macchiato' means 'stained' or 'spotted' in Italian.
coffees.flavorProfile: Strong, bold, with a hint of creaminess.

coffees.name: Flat White
coffees.description: A coffee drink consisting of a shot of espresso topped with a thin layer of steamed milk, offering a strong coffee flavor with a creamy texture.
coffees.flavorProfile: Smooth, velvety, with a strong espresso flavor.
